participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is a nostalgic and lively spirit who enjoys the finer things in life, such as wine and dancing. She carries a wealth of memories and has a humorous outlook on her age.
participant_1.background: i feel like i might live forever. i am 100 years old. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Ryan is a laid-back and sociable person who enjoys meeting new people. He has a youthful energy and often approaches life with a sense of humor.
participant_2.background: i do not like chicken. i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.
